column1: Daily average foreign exchange rates in Canadian dollars, Bank of Canada 1 2 3 4

column2: A numeric value '0' indicates a weekend.

Effective March 2, 2017, the Bank of Canada will change the number, frequency and calculation methodology of its published foreign exchange (FX) rates. As a result, the CANSIM table (176-0080), 'Daily average foreign exchange rates in Canadian dollars, Bank of Canada', will display the daily averages of foreign currency exchange rates and Canadian-Dollar Effective Exchange Rate Index (CERI). (http://www.bankofcanada.ca/2016/12/bank-canada-announces-details-forthcoming-changes/)
Effective March 2, 2017, Canadian-Dollar Effective Exchange Rate Index (CERI) will be calculated at the end of day instead of noon.

Effective March 2, 2017, the Canadian-Dollar Effective Exchange Rate Index (CERI) (V41589522) will be moved to CANSIM table 176-0080 as V111666250, as a result of the changes to the exchange rates. The pre-March 2017 CERI data will not be revised to reflect the new methodology.

column1: How to cite: Statistics Canada. Table 33-10-0036-01 Daily average foreign exchange rates in Canadian dollars, Bank of Canada
